Intro.paragraph: FREEDOMojis the original generative pixel art 10,000 randomly generated NFT's that live on the Ethereum blockchain. Ethereum is the largest and most secure decentralized blockchain that can execute smart contracts. This means that this collection cannot be censored or cancelled, like our voices. 95% of ALL mint sales and royalties will be donated to the hard-working people that stand up for freedom and are currently fighting for it.

Intro2.paragraph2: Freedom is one of the most important rights that we have and I believe no one should not have to fight to achieve it.  Over the last few weeks, we have seen peaceful protestors vilified and demonized by main stream media, social media and our leaders.  I have watched hopelessly on the sidelines wishing I could do something to help the cause.  I am releasing this project because I will not watch anymore knowing I can do something to help.  This collection will be released with no advertising, no schilling
